Content.Content:
[$BOX] [$CELL] [$BLOCK]

First, divide the total amount of fluids to be infused (125 mL) by the number of minutes over which it is to be infused (one hour = 60 minutes), then, multiply by the drip factor: (125 ÷ 60) X 15 = 31.

[$/BLOCK] [$/CELL] [$/BOX]
Content.Name: PHYSIOLOGICAL INTEGRITY 94
